DOC.brief_title: Stress Management Couples Undergoing In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF )
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator try determine two different stress management technique couple undergo IVF . One arm randomize learn technique watch follow instruction digital video disc ( DVD ) . The arm in-person class teach couple different stress reduction technique .
